subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Runnin' Rebels' first-round game with Georgia Tech made for a testy and sloppy low-scoring affair, marked by referee whistles, splayed bodies, mishandled passes and missed shots.
snippet: The Runnin' Rebels' first-round game with Georgia Tech made for a testy and sloppy low-scoring affair, marked by referee whistles, splayed bodies, mishandled passes and missed shots.
